page.title: 12Tescos
page.content: It is possible to buy nearly everything a family would need in the store. There is a car park next to the store for customrs to use. We asked fifty people who were entering the store why they used Tescos and where they came from. This is a summary of their answers;42% came from Trowbridge,12% from Bradford-on-Avon,12% from villages which are within a two mile radius of Trowbridge and the other 30% from no further than 10 miles away. The reasons that people gave for choosing to shop at Tescos were very varied. The most popular reason given was that it was convenient(one lady from Warminster said this!)and that there was a wide variety of goods all under one roof.
